I am learning how to do data science. This is built using a [Quarto Website](https://quarto.org/docs/websites/). This is a powerful tool in data science. It enables me to easily display code and output at my discretion. Below is an example of this in action.

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false


library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
```

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| message: false
#| warning: false

penguins %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = body_mass_g, y = bill_length_mm), color = species) +
  geom_point(aes(color = species))+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE, aes(color = species)) +
  scale_color_colorblind() +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(
    x = "Body Mass (g)",
    y = "Flipper Length (mm)",
    color = "Penguin Species"
  )
```
